casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Adrian McCLAIN and Demetrius Shawn Hill. No. 3P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Demetrius Shawn Hill. John P. Barkley, Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Assistant Attorney Generals, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Adrian S. McClain, Pro Se.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th day of January 2004 by Defendant (Adrian McClain) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of February 2004."
